name: Mars
pages: The red planet!$(br2)Mars can be found in space roughly north of the sun.$(br2)Natural resources: iron, redstone.$(br)Mobs: Voided, Skeletons, SpaceFellows, Rust Slimes, Mars Mallows

pages.text: Martian bricks can be used to craft a portal to Mars, and then lit using a steel rod.$(br2)Note: Martian portals can only be used from the overworld to Mars.$(br2)This does mean you either need to be in creative mode or visit Mars for the first time using the spaceship!
